community for life

About us

Louis El'Chonen was born and raised in Michigan and has been a developer of quality residential and commercial properties in both Florida and Michigan for over 60 years.

After developing several upscale affordable Mobile Home projects in Southwest Florida, Louis turned his attention to Michigan. He saw that people in Michigan could benefit from a subdivision styled manufactured home community like the upscale retirement communities in Florida.

With this in mind, he designed and developed American Presidential Estates & Capitol Hills.

American Presidential Estates & Capitol Hills are proud members of Michigan Manufactured Housing and RV Association

American Presidential Estates & Capitol Hills are in good standing with the State of Michigan, Manufactured Housing Commission, with zero complaints on file.

With a 20+ Year Track Record of Excellence, we have stood the test of time

welcome home
